Name: La Feuille Morte
Instructions: POUR first 3 ingredients into glass. Serve iced water separately in a small jug (known in France as a 'broc') so the customer can dilute to their own taste. (I recommend five shots). Lastly, add ice to fill glass.
Review: A traditional French way to serve pastis.
History: Pronounced 'Fueel-Mort', the name literally means 'The dead leaf', a reference to its colour.
Nutrition: One serving of La Feuille Morte contains 162 calories
